summary: Driving automation and scalability in business operations. Building  internal tools for real-time Income Statement, Cash Flow, and Expense Tracking, backed by ERP integrations and Bank APIs.
Launched a one-to-one live auction integration for sports items like Jerseys and Balls, allowing users to participate in auctions by biding using Chiliz. Initiated several automations.
Worked with the 100mentors leadership team to establish product management processes and build the roadmap for a fresh GenAI-powered product.
Rotated through a portfolio of wappier integrations within casual mobile games. The goal was to enhance retention, elevate user engagement, and increase AARPU.
